pages.text: $(bred)Dancing Zombie$() is already rocketing up the undead charts.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : it can summon Backup Dancers on four sides, if one Backup Dancer died, it will summon one again. $(bred)Spawn Limit 40 zombies$().
